Tableau Workshop

This lesson will take you through creating a data visualization with Tableau.

Getting the Data

We are going to be mapping Crime Data in the US from 1960 to 2014. This data comes from the FBIâ€™s Uniform Crime Reporting Statistics. The table was created using the UCR Data Tool using the State by state and national estimates options. Like most real world data this data is not perfect.

View the notes on this data set

We also performed minor clean up for this data to be more easily useable.
